job.title: System Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>JOB DUTIES: </strong></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span></strong></p><p><strong>Part-time Tableau Administrator</strong></p><p><strong>Working Hours(15-20 hours per week)</strong></p><p><br></p><p>Part-time Tableau Administrator will resolve Tableau Administration ServiceNow tickets including customer interaction as per SLA targets when possible Part-time Tableau Administrator will actively contribute to the ServiceNow Knowledge base and articles regarding incident and service request resolution processes Part-time Tableau Administrator will monitor Tableau Server Health Part-time Tableau Administrator will assist and manage Tableau upgrades (including BitBucket) , back-ups, and restoration Part-time Tableau Administrator will participate in troubleshooting calls with 3rd parties that integrate with Tableau Part-time Tableau Administrator will assist/set-up and manage Tableau extensions, extensions servers, and run extension code (Python, R)</p>
